name: Mokoko
description:
The old arcade soul is back with Mokoko! Draw without getting caught to enemies and capture areas. Capture the most of the area to save girls from their afflicters.
We remastered this gameplay with a modern touch while keeping the old arcade style.
8 girls to save
24 levels with 24 unique bosses with their minions
24 stories you will learn details about the bosses and the girls
Lovely graphics!
Traps, towers, crates and bonus effects
Arcade style
Nostalgia remastered!
Fight against the weird enemies...
... and learn about their absurd stories!
